title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furnishings / Chair, Ottoman; Bed, Headboard; Desk; Chair", ca. 1937
description: Rough sketches of furniture for Harold S. Anderson house, Bel Air, CA. Upholstered armchair and ottoman on left, curved armrests and back of chair. Chair and ottoman low to ground on squat feet. To the right, upholstered side chair, low to ground on squat feet. Above is desk with two wide rectangular plank legs and drawer on base of desk. Top of desk is rounded at right side, with open shelf below in same curved fashion. Double-bed with cylindrical pillow at right. Nightstands built into long headboard, which extends past each side of bed. Headboard curves inward on right side of bed. Bed is low to ground with no discernible feet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furnishings / Chair, Ottoman; Bed, Headboard; Desk; Chair", ca. 1937.
ca. 1937. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-304-13.
